attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any member of Parliament who is found to have been fiddling expenses, not declaring benefits such as not disclosing all details to get mortgages and not behaving in an honest and upright manner should be expelled from Parliament and all rights to a pension paid by the public purse to be removed. There should be an outside body set up to look into expenses and all financial affairs of the Members of Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
